name: UFGPowerConnectionComponent
comment: Special type of circuit connection that provides a connection to the power grid.

methods.name: SetPowerInfo
methods.comment: Set the power info for this connection.

methods.name: GetPowerInfo
methods.comment: Get the power info from which to get the consumption/production.

methods.name: GetPowerCircuit
methods.comment:
@return The circuit this is connected to; nullptr if not connected.
@note This can be changed/removed at any time so do not save copies to it.

properties.name: mPowerInfo
properties.comment:
The power info for this connection.
Should be unique for each connection or a race condition can occur for setting the circuit ID on the power info.
